After everything that's been said about the racism & white European exceptionalism running through the reporting of the war in Ukraine; @SkyNews letting the same rhetoric slip through into its youth programming. This is from Easter weekend's FYI. A programme aimed at our kids. https://t.co/SWTS2I6Qho https://t.co/3154xIj7yW

Keeping track of war in Ukraine is exhausting. I have to remind myself that I don't have to read about every horror coming from there.

A kind of photo that I have to add to the list of things that haunt me is Ukrainian dads in uniform holding their babies. That cuts very close.

Once upon a time after Zanu PF lost the 2008 parliamentary majority seats in Masvingo and Manicaland then war veterans leader Jabulani Sibanda spent one solid year in those provinces ahead of 2013 without telling the public anything and we know what happened. Boots on the ground

Why the outrage from Labour, about a lying PM, the last two it had did the same.

One for a war for the oil dollar.

The other still lying his chicken skin tits aff about Scotland and independence.

As does the Fannyhammer, and the handpicked millionaire called Anas - today.

My ex wife fled the war in Yugoslavia. She then worked for immigration Canada for almost 2 decades. 
She has seen before what Justine Trudeau is doing and is scared.
She is now asking me to flee Canada for the sake of freedom and opportunity for our kids. I am looking into it.
